nodes.name: airtable
nodes.description: Read, update, write and delete data from Airtable

options.name: Create
options.description: Create a new record in a table

options.name: Create or Update
options.description: Create a new record, or update the current one if it already exists (upsert)

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete a record from a table

options.name: Get
options.description: Retrieve a record from a table

options.name: Search
options.description: Search for specific records or list all

options.name: Update
options.description: Update a record in a table
Whether to ignore letter case when evaluating conditions
options.name: ignoreCase

nodes.name: switch
nodes.description: Route items depending on defined expression or rules

nodes.name: webhook
nodes.description: Starts the workflow when a webhook is called

nodes.name: httpRequest
nodes.description: Makes an HTTP request and returns the response data

nodes.name: set
nodes.description: Add or edit fields on an input item and optionally remove other fields

nodes.name: function
nodes.description: Run custom function code which gets executed once and allows you to add, remove, change and replace items

properties.name: functionCode
properties.description: 要执行的 JS 代码

nodes.name: merge
nodes.description: Merges data of multiple streams once data from both is available

nodes.name: splitInBatches
nodes.description: Split data into batches and iterate over each batch

nodes.name: code
nodes.description: Run custom JavaScript or Python code

nodes.name: emailSend
nodes.description: Sends an email using SMTP protocol

nodes.name: manualTrigger
nodes.description: Runs the flow on clicking a button in n8n

nodes.name: cron
nodes.description: Triggers the workflow at a specific time

nodes.name: ftp
nodes.description: Transfer files via FTP or SFTP

nodes.name: graphql
nodes.description: Makes a GraphQL request and returns the received data

nodes.name: kafka
nodes.description: Sends messages to a Kafka topic

properties.name: topic
properties.description: Name of the queue of topic to publish to

properties.name: sendInputData
properties.description: Whether to send the data the node receives as JSON to Kafka

properties.name: useSchemaRegistry
properties.description: Whether to use Confluent Schema Registry

properties.name: useKey
properties.description: Whether to use a message key

properties.name: eventName
properties.description: Namespace and Name of Schema in Schema Registry (namespace.name)

options.name: acks
options.description: Whether or not producer must wait for acknowledgement from all replicas

options.name: compression
options.description: Whether to send the data in a compressed format using the GZIP codec

options.name: timeout
options.description: The time to await a response in ms

nodes.name: mongoDb
nodes.description: Find, insert and update documents in MongoDB

nodes.name: mySql
nodes.description: Get, add and update data in MySQL

nodes.name: postgres
nodes.description: Get, add and update data in Postgres

nodes.name: rabbitmq
nodes.description: Sends messages to a RabbitMQ topic

nodes.name: redis
nodes.description: Get, send and update data in Redis

nodes.name: s3
nodes.description: Sends data to any S3-compatible service

nodes.name: scheduleTrigger
nodes.description: Triggers the workflow on a given schedule

nodes.name: readBinaryFile
nodes.description: Reads a binary file from disk

properties.name: dataPropertyName
properties.description: 写入二进制数据的字段名

nodes.name: writeBinaryFile
nodes.description: Writes a binary file to disk

properties.name: dataPropertyName
properties.description: 包含要写入数据的二进制字段名

nodes.name: moveBinaryData
nodes.description: Move data between binary and JSON properties

nodes.name: spreadsheetFile
nodes.description: Reads and writes data from a spreadsheet file like CSV, XLS, ODS, etc

properties.name: code

options.name: disableDotNotation
options.description: 是否禁用点号引用子字段

properties.name: keep
properties.description: 保留前几条还是后几条

nodes.name: wait
nodes.description: Pause workflow execution until a condition is met or a time has passed

nodes.name: googleSheets
nodes.description: Read, update and write data to Google Sheets

nodes.name: trello
nodes.description: Create, change and delete boards and cards

nodes.name: econMLDlinearMLApi
nodes.description: Estimate causal effects using Double Machine Learning (DML)

properties.name: modelY
properties.description: Model to predict outcome variable Y

properties.name: cv
properties.description: Number of CV folds for model training

properties.name: apiEndpoint
properties.description: URL of the EconML API endpoint
